text: The Miss Universe Canada 2005 pageant was held on March 1, 2005. The winner represented Canada in the Miss Universe 2005 and won its second crown. The first runner-up represented Canada in Miss International 2005. ==Final results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- ! Final results !
